thread.title: I just don’t have bikini body: Drew Barrymore
thread.title_full: I just don’t have bikini body: Drew Barrymore

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: I just don’t have bikini body: Drew Barrymore
text:
Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 10: Drew Barrymore is known for her carefree nature and the actress prefers to stay the same when it comes to her body shape, calling it her choice. (Also Read: Selena Gomez opens up about being called fat) 
The 40-year-old “50 First Dates” star says she is loving the way her body currently looks, reported People magazine.”I am who I am and I just don’t have a bikini body. I don’t even have a one piece body anymore! But I am loving the long rash guard, board-shorts look,” she said. 
The actress joked that if someone asks her for a beach outing she go berserk thinking what she is going to wear.”It’s not always easy to be so laid-back about it. I’ve beaten myself up about not being a certain thing. If someone says, ‘Let’s go to the beach today,’ my first thought is, what am I going to wear?,” she said. 
  10, 2015 10:38 AM Topics:
